text: I know maya well. Houdini is free to download as well. It doesn't take long to learn a new package really one you know one though. Craig, do you think Houdini FX to Unreal Engine would be interesting? I think there is a shortage of fx artists more than anything? I like a bit of everything but FX would be more challenging than modelling for example. I like things not because they are easy but because they are hard.
